mapper.select:
select count(*) from mon_soft_status a LEFT JOIN eqi_equipment b ON a.equipment_id= b.equipment_id
and a.equipment_id like '%${equipmentId}%'
and b.equipment_name like '%${equipmentName}%'
and a.device_name like '%${deviceName}%'
and a.device_so_type like '%${deviceSoType}%'
and a.device_so_run_status like '%${deviceSoRunStatus}%'

select a.software_run_id, a.equipment_id, a.app_id, a.device_name, a.device_so_type, a.device_so_run_status, a.cpu_rate, a.storage_rate, a.error_rate, a.create_time, b.equipment_name
from mon_soft_status a LEFT JOIN eqi_equipment b ON a.equipment_id= b.equipment_id
and a.equipment_id like '%${equipmentId}%'
and b.equipment_name like '%${equipmentName}%'
and a.device_name like '%${deviceName}%'
and a.device_so_type like '%${deviceSoType}%'
and a.device_so_run_status like '%${deviceSoRunStatus}%'
order by ${field} ${order}
limit ${begin},${limit}
